# query-guard

- [Documentation](https://query-guard.liha.dev/)
- [Full Documentation for AI](https://query-guard.liha.dev/llms-full.txt)
- [Repository](https://github.com/liha-labs/query-guard)

## Quick Start

```ts
import { createBrowserAdapter, createQueryGuard } from 'query-guard'

const resolver = {
  resolve: ({ raw }) => ({ value: { q: raw.q ?? '' } }),
  serialize: (value) => ({ q: value.q })
}

const guard = createQueryGuard({
  adapter: createBrowserAdapter(),
  resolver,
  defaultValue: { q: '' }
})
```
